result.eng: In the usual place, I guess.
result.html: Sa ghnáth-áit is dóchaIn the usual place, I guess.
result.ponchtml: Sa ġnáṫ-áit is dóċaIn the usual place, I guess.

result.eng: I guess it wasn't worth the hassle.
result.ga: Níorbh fhiú an tairbhe an trioblóid b'fhéidir
result.orig: Níorbh fhiú an tairbhe an trioblóid b'fhéidir
result.html: Níorbh fhiú an tairbhe an trioblóid b'fhéidirI guess it wasn't worth the hassle.
result.ponchtml: Níorḃ ḟiú an tairḃe an trioblóid b'ḟéidirI guess it wasn't worth the hassle.

result.eng: I guess it is their lot, as schoolmasters, to be fond of the bottle.
result.ga: Is cosúil go bhfuil sé de bhuaidh orthu a bheith tugtha don ghloine mar mháistrí scoile
result.orig: Is cosúil go bhfuil sé de bhuaidh orthu a bheith tugtha don ghloine mar mháistrí scoile
result.html: Is cosúil go bhfuil sé de bhuaidh orthu a bheith tugtha don ghloine mar mháistrí scoileI guess it is their lot, as schoolmasters, to be fond of the bottle.
result.ponchtml: Is cosúil go ḃfuil sé de ḃuaiḋ orṫu a ḃeiṫ tugṫa don ġloine mar ṁáistrí scoileI guess it is their lot, as schoolmasters, to be fond of the bottle.

result.eng: You wouldn't guess where I've been!
result.html: Cha dtomhaisfeá cá raibh méYou wouldn't guess where I've been!
result.ponchtml: Ċa dtoṁaisfeá cá raiḃ méYou wouldn't guess where I've been!
